New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Kumar Sangakkara's 118th fifty-plus score in ODIs
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a run-a-ball fifty, his fifth fifty-plus score in the ongoing tournament
Kohli and Shubman Gill stitched a 100-plus partnership in Mumbai
Dushmatha Chameera dropped a return catch in the 6th over when Kohli was on 10
Miscellaneous Highlights: Virat Kohli now has the second-most fifty-plus scores in ODI World Cups - 13 and he is 9 behind the legendary Sachin Tendulkar
Kohli hit 8 boundaries against Sri Lanka as he got good support from Shubman Gill
